job.title: Site Reliability Engineer
job.description: <p><strong>Required Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>4-5 years of work experience year work experience in a DevOps or Site Reliability Engineer role.</li><li>Good working knowledge in production/application support</li><li>Good with OOP concepts and Python programming/scripting</li><li>Strong Computer Science fundamentals in Data Structures, Algorithms, Complexity Analysis, Object-Oriented Design and Designing Large Scale Data-Intensive Applications.</li><li>4+ years industry experience in Expert Knowledge in Linux, Python, Shell, JavaScript, MongoDB, Elasticsearch, Redis</li><li>Comfortable multi-tasking, managing multiple stakeholders and working as part of a team</li></ul><p>&nbsp;</p><p><strong>Preferred Qualifications:</strong></p><ul><li>Experience in ELK Stack (Elasticsearch, Logstash, Kibana) or Prometheus + Grafana</li><li>Experience with continuous deployment/delivery practices</li><li>AWS Certifications such as Solution Architect, DevOps Engineer</li><li>Experience with Container technologies like Docker, Kubernetes</li><li>Experience with cloud computing systems</li><li>Networking including TCP, HTTP, DNS, SSL certificates</li><li>Knowledge of Slang/SecDB is a plus</li></ul><p><br></p><p><br></p><p>if your interested, please share updated resume to <u>dilipkumar.tm@itcinfotech.com</u></p>
